comments.body:
it is but it has `Signature` tpe, and I need `MethodSignature`. I could do casting here but I prefer to keep casting where check is performed and simply provide it here with correct tpe (but yes it is duplicated).
If `SymbolInformation` was generic with `SymbolInformation[X <: Signature]` I could say here I need `baseMethodSymbolInformation: SymbolInformation[MethodSignature]` but I can't with current types.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +78,82 @@  private def matchMethodInClass(
      superClass: ClassHierarchyItem,
      baseMethodSymbolInformation: SymbolInformation,
      baseMethodInfo: MethodSignature,
      findSymbol: String => Option[SymbolInformation]
